author: Laura
text:
I decided to list a few used items that I didn't want anymore, in this way they would be still used by someone and I could get some money back of what I originally paid for them. 

One day suddenly Vinted closed my account without any real reason. They just told me I was doing 'commercial activities' and making a steady source of income. I had listed only 7 items and I sold 3 in a period of 3 months, how come was that commercial and a source of income?. They don't have email or phone number or any way to discuss the situation with them. They will just send you an automatic message with a generic text, clearly a template they use for everyone without giving you a proper reason for blocking the account or giving you the chance to discuss it. They just don't care about you. They kick you out and close the door so that you cannot even complain. 

Really frustrating.
title: Very frustrating experience

author: Lauren
text: Bought a couple of items back in Nov 2021. The money went out of my account and I received the items, no problem. However two weeks ago I received my bank statement showing that the amount for these items has been taken again, over 3 months later. Contacted vinted, they said there has been a problem with their ‘Payment service provider’ and some monies were not taken at the time. I have sent them copies of my statements showing that they have taken money twice over and over again and now they are just ignoring me. I hopefully will get the money back from my credit card company but the scary thing is they have held onto my card details all this time and have taken money without my permission.
title: Awful - trust the reviews

author: Jane
text:
The system has glitches. If one blocks a seller, messages still can be received. Support team does not see multiple messages as harassment. In fact, support team is useless. Responds fast, but do nothing in reality. Do not mediate, do not stand by the right side. Bottom line - their policies are only words and nothing else. 

Both sellers and buyers have no protection whatsoever. Even when factual evidence is presented. 

Some sellers sell faulty items from time to time. Even when they have majority of good reviews and just a few bad. Generally, no effort is made to reconcile the situation from both seller and Vinted. 

Evidently, even here, on TrustPilot, Vinted does nothing to respond and to resolve negative reviews.

Do not recommend and will not use again.
title: Idea is good, execution is bad.
